units.name: Skitarii Vanguard

abilities.name: Rad-Saturation
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] Each time this unit shoots or fights, until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit suffers one or more hits from this unit, that enemy unit is rad-saturated until the end of the turn.

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

units.lore: Skitarii Vanguard march ahead of the main Mechanicus force, saturating the battlefield with ambient radiation from their radium carbines.

units.name: Skitarii Rangers

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

abilities.name: Clandestine Kills
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is not within 12" of any other friendly units, that attack has the PRECISION ability.

units.lore: Adept long-range marksmen, Skitarii Rangers pursue their quarry across vast distances before delivering killing shots with methodical precision.

units.name: Tech-Priest Dominus

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the benefit of this character's aura abilities. It can be attached to SKITARII INFANTRY or KATAPHRON units.

abilities.name: Master of Machines
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] At the start of your Command phase, one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE or WALKER unit within 3" of this model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Fabricator Blessing
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

units.lore: The Dominus stands above lesser Tech-Priests, a living machine of war whose augmented body is as much weapon as it is flesh and steel.

units.name: Tech-Priest Manipulus

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the benefit of this character's aura abilities. It can be attached to SKITARII INFANTRY or SICARIAN units.

abilities.name: Galvanic Field
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6, that attack scores 1 additional hit.

abilities.name: Mechadendrite Halo
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

units.lore: The Manipulus oversees the spiritual and physical maintenance of Skitarii cohorts, bolstering their combat effectiveness through noospheric communion.

units.name: Kataphron Breachers

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

abilities.name: Semi-independent Body
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit is treated as two separate units for the purpose of transport capacity.

units.lore: Kataphron Breachers are heavy assault servitors, their cybernetic bulk reinforced with industrial hydraulics and torsion weaponry.

units.name: Kastelan Robots

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

abilities.name: Repulsor Grid
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Battle Protocols
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] At the start of your Command phase, if a friendly CYBERNETICA DATASMITH is within 6" of this unit, you can change this unit's Battle Protocol.

units.lore: Ancient automata of immense power, Kastelan Robots are relics of a forgotten age, their minds locked into rigid behavioral protocols.

units.name: Sicarian Ruststalkers

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

abilities.name: Hyperactive Neosynaptic Networks
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Talons of the Omnissiah
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] Each time this unit makes a consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of 3".

units.lore: Sicarian Ruststalkers are the shadows of the Skitarii Legion, assassins who stalk prey through the static of noospheric interference.

units.name: Sicarian Infiltrators

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

abilities.name: Infiltrate
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] During deployment, you can set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from the enemy deployment zone and all enemy models.

abilities.name: Appropriated Munitions
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] Each time this unit ends a Normal Move, Advance or Charge, you can select one enemy unit within 1" of it. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit cannot receive the benefits of cover.

units.lore: Sicarian Infiltrators are espionage specialists, their mechadendrite hoods flooding the noosphere with false signals as they slip behind enemy lines.

units.name: Onager Dunecrawler

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

abilities.name: Emanatus Force Field
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] Friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY units that are within 3" of this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Broad Spectrum Data-tether
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] Friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS units within 6" of this unit can use this unit's Leadership characteristic instead of their own when taking Battleshock tests.

units.lore: The Onager Dunecrawler is a heavily armoured walker that serves as fire support for Skitarii cohorts, its neutron laser capable of coring battle tanks.

units.name: Archaeopter Stratoraptor

abilities.name: Doctrina Imperatives
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] This unit benefits from the active Doctrina Imperative chosen at the start of each battle round.

abilities.name: Hard to Hit
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] Each time a ranged attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Hover
abilities.description: [PLACEHOLDER] At the start of the first battle round, before the first turn begins, you can remove this unit from the battlefield and redeploy it anywhere in your deployment zone.

units.lore: The Stratoraptor dominates the skies, its twin lascannons hunting armour and aircraft with equal ferocity.
